description: Bursting with fresh green summer vegetables, these mini tortillas make a great appetizer. Alternatively, for a packed lunch, wrap them in foil to transport.
keywords: Tortilla,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Halal,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Zucchini Spinach & Pea Mini Tortillas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, mix the zucchini, spinach, lemon zest and juice, peas, and pine nuts together. Season well.
Heat a frying pan over a high heat. Place two tortilla halves in the pan at a time and heat for 15 seconds on each side. Cover the heated tortillas with a tea towel to keep warm.

Brush one of the tortilla halves with mayonnaise. Place a little of the filling in the centre. Arrange some pea sprouts and pea shoots on top, so that they stick out at one end, then roll up the tortilla. Repeat to make 20 mini tortillas.
